label: INFA - Image To Word Converter
description: Provides action to convert image files in a folder into a word document.
Image To Word.label: Image To Word Converter
Image To Word.description: Converts image files (png, jpg, jpeg, gif, webp,) in a folder into a word document
Image To Word.node_label: Converts image files in a folder into a word document
Image To Word.return_label: Assign the output to String variable
Image To Word.return_label_description: Returns the word document value as a String
Image To Word.inputFilePath.label: Source folder
Image To Word.outputFilePath.label: Destination folder
